n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>FCERNY</SCHEMA> <NAME>BSA_VIEW_PROJECT_FIXED_SUPPLY</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SUPPLY_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DESCRIPTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DATEPURCHASED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UNITSPURCHASED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>TOTALCOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUANTITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PROJECT_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UNITCOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COSTBASIS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select fqs.id as supply_id, fqs.name, fqs.description, fqs.datepurchased, fqs.unitspurchased, fqs.totalcost, pt.quantity, pt.project_id, (fqs.totalCost/fqs.unitspurchased) as unitcost, ((fqs.totalCost/fqs.unitspurchased) * pt.quantity) as costbasis from bsa_fixed_quantity_supply fqs inner join bsa_project_fixed_quantity_supply pt on pt.supply_id = fqs.id </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
